name: Plympton Inc.
description: Operator of a digital literary studio intended to focus on promoting digital publishing among readers. The company's studio offers curated mobile reading service, virtual reality adaptation of novels, recovers classics, creates motion stories, and powers a subway library, enabling readers to have free access to hundreds of e-books, excerpts, and short stories.
